body_html: The error in optimizer.py prints the Variable object, which is shown as e.g. <tensorflow.python.ops.variables.Variable object at 0x7ff7ed095350>, not very informative. It should probably display Variable.name.
body_text: The error in optimizer.py prints the Variable object, which is shown as e.g. <tensorflow.python.ops.variables.Variable object at 0x7ff7ed095350>, not very informative. It should probably display Variable.name.
body: The error in optimizer.py prints the Variable object, which is shown as e.g. `<tensorflow.python.ops.variables.Variable object at 0x7ff7ed095350>`, not very informative. It should probably display `Variable.name`.
